scripts.script: INSERT INTO @target.dbo.SecurityProfiles (ProfileID,ProfileName, RowLevelAccessTypeID,EmployerID,CreateDateTime,CreateDateTime,UpdatedByUserID,UpdateDateTime,DerivedFromProfileID,UseDefault) SELECT ProfileID,ProfileName, RowLevelAccessTypeID,EmployerID,CreateDateTime,CreateDateTime,UpdatedByUserID,UpdateDateTime,DerivedFromProfileID,UseDefault FROM [@source].[dbo].[SecurityProfiles] WHERE EmployerID IS NULL

INSERT INTO @target.dbo.ApplicationSettings (ApplicationSettingID,EmployerID,Code,Setting,[Description],UpdateDateTime,AllowUserModification,ExpectedValue,UpdatedByUserID,CreatedByUserID,CreationDateTime,ValidationType,ValidationData,ValidationMin,ValidationMax,ValidationMaxMinValueType,ExtendedHelp,Unit,ControlType,ControlSupportData,SaveDataTreatment,DisplayOrder,AllowUserView,Value) SELECT ApplicationSettingID,EmployerID,Code,Setting,[Description],UpdateDateTime,AllowUserModification,ExpectedValue,UpdatedByUserID,CreatedByUserID,CreationDateTime,ValidationType,ValidationData,ValidationMin,ValidationMax,ValidationMaxMinValueType,ExtendedHelp,Unit,ControlType,ControlSupportData,SaveDataTreatment,DisplayOrder,AllowUserView,Value FROM [@source].[dbo].[ApplicationSettings] WHERE EmployerID IS NULL

INSERT INTO @target.configuration.GridViews (GridViewId,EmployerId,ParentId,Name,IsDefault,IsPublic,CreatedDateTime,CreatedByUserId,UpdatedDateTime,UpdatedByUserId,ObjectName,ViewConfig,DisplayOrder) SELECT GridViewId,EmployerId,ParentId,Name,IsDefault,IsPublic,CreatedDateTime,CreatedByUserId,UpdatedDateTime,UpdatedByUserId,ObjectName,ViewConfig,DisplayOrder FROM [@source].[configuration].[GridViews] WHERE SecurityObjectID IS NULL
